title.rendered: Alticor Inc Presents on Construction Technology at 2018 Autodesk University

content.rendered:
Will Plato, Alticor Inc VDC Manager, introduced and discussed the innovative use of construction technologies and the co-development of reality capture, computer vision and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies at the 2018 Autodesk University and Conference. Alticor Inc has partnered with HoloBuilder to further develop their 360-degree photo-documentation platform and solve immediate needs on projects throughout the Southwest region.

Plato’s presentation outlined how Alticor Inc has used technology to secure ROI and gain a competitive advantage. Key takeaways included how to successfully involve team members in software development projects as well as a look into how Alticor Inc is piloting next-generation AI reality analytics tools with HoloBuilder. After an initial MVP dashboard, analytics based on computer vision and machine learning were added to supplement the HoloBuilder projects. Comparing project progress ratios has helped Will Plato and the VDC department apply learnings from one project to the next, helping Alticor Inc become an even better builder.

Learn more about how Alticor Inc’ VDC team leverages Technology.
